name: Inception
description: Cobb steals information from his targets by entering their dreams. He is wanted for his alleged role in his wife's murder and his only chance at redemption is to perform a nearly impossible task.

name: The Matrix
description: When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Cobb steals information from his targets by entering their dreams. He is wanted for his alleged role in his wife's murder and his only chance at redemption is to perform a nearly impossible task.

name: 3 Idiots
description: Two friends are searching for their long-lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them idiots.

name: Jab We Met
description: A depressed businessman accidentally meets a bubbly and talkative woman during a train journey. Their interactions bring unexpected turns to their lives and relationships.

name: Pushpa: The Rise
description: The rise of a laborer in the smuggling syndicate of red sandalwood is marked by ambition, love, and unyielding determination in the face of numerous challenges.

name: Avengers
description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

name: Devara: Part 1
description: A mighty sea warrior takes a violent stand against the criminal deeds of his village. Years later, his mild-mannered son walks a path of his own.

name: RRR
description: A fearless warrior on a perilous mission comes face to face with a steely cop serving British forces in this epic saga set in pre-independent India.

name: Chhichhore
description: Following a group of friends from university as they progress into middle-age life and go their own separate ways.
